title: Broken Gifting Center
body:
Hi, I add a friend in league in my 2 count, like 3 min ago and i add my main account too. My friend appear in gifting center but i want to send a skin to my main account and my count dont appear in gifting center.
Someone can help me pls ?

replies.body:
A Summoner (even an alt) must be your friend for 24 hours before you can send gifts to it.

Let me know if you have any further issues after this time has passed.
